string-array.name: facts
string-array.item: "And tomorrow's just a mystery, oh, yeah, but that's okay. I'm alone, on my own and I'm starting off. I'll be strong, I'll be wrong, oh, but life goes on. Oh, I'm just a girl trying to find a place in this world."
"He's the song in the car I keep singing. Dont know why i do."
"And we know its never simple, never easy. Never a clean break, no one here to save me."
"So watch me strike a match on all my wasted time. As far as I'm concerned, you're just another picture to burn."
"I'm only me when i'm with you."
"And all I think about is how to make you think of me, and everything that we could be"
"I'm only up when you're not down. Don't wanna fly if you're still on the ground."
"Feels like I'm falling and i am lost in your eyes. You make me crazier, crazier, crazier."
"I'm intimidated by the fear of being average."
"I'm not that complicated. My complications come out in my songs. All you need to do to be my friend is like me."
"What I've learned is not to change who you are, because eventually you're going to run out of new things to become."
"Talk to the man with the reasons why."
"You don't even know where I start."

"Everybody has that point in their life where you hit a crossroads and you've had a bunch of bad days and there's different ways you can deal with it and the way I dealt with it was I just turned completely to music."
"I never want to change so much that people can't recognize me."
"I suffer from girlnextdooritis where the guy is friends with you and that's it."
"This is a new year. A new beginning. And things will change."
"To me, Fearless is living in spite of those things that scare you to death."
"People haven't always been there for me but music always has."
"I suffer from girlnextdooritis where the guy is friends with you and that's it."
"I never want to change so much that people can't recognize me."
"Now its too late for you and your White Horse to come around."
"You don't even know where I start."
"What I've learned is not to change who you are, because eventually you're going to run out of new things to become."
"I'm not that complicated. My complications come out in my songs. All you need to do to be my friend is like me."
"I'm intimidated by the fear of being average."
"Feels like I'm falling and i am lost in your eyes. You make me crazier, crazier, crazier."
"I'm only up when you're not down. Don't wanna fly if you're still on the ground."
"And all I think about is how to make you think of me, and everything that we could be."
"I'm only me when i'm with you"
"So watch me strike a match on all my wasted time. As far as I'm concerned, you're just another picture to burn."
"He's the song in the car I keep singing. Dont know why i do."

"And tomorrow's just a mystery, oh, yeah, but that's okay. I'm alone, on my own and I'm starting off. I'll be strong, I'll be wrong, oh, but life goes on. Oh, I'm just a girl trying to find a place in this world."
"People haven't always been there for me but music always has."
"I miss your tanned skin, your sweet smile, so good to me, so right."
"I'd go back to December, turn around and change my own mind."
"It turns out freedom ain't nothing but missing you, Wishing I'd realized what I had when you were mine."
"And then the cold came, the dark days when fear crept into my mind. You gave me all your love and all I gave you was goodbye..."
"These days I haven't been sleeping. Staying up playing back myself leavin."
"And I go back to December all the time."
"So this is me swallowing my pride Standing in front of you saying, \"I'm sorry for that night\"."
"You gave me roses and I left them there to die."
"Your guard is up and I know why, because the last time you saw me is still burned in the back of your mind."
"I'm so glad you made time to see me. How's life? Tell me how's your family?"
"Oh, I remember you were driving to my house In the middle of the night. I'm the one who makes you laugh When you know you're about to cry."
"Standing by you Waiting at your backdoor. All this time How could you not know, baby."
"Been here all along So why can't you see You belong with me?"
"Can't you see That I'm the one Who understands you?"
"Dreaming about the day when you wake up and find that what you're looking for has been here the whole time."
"She wears high heels, I wear sneakers. She's cheer captain, And I'm on the bleachers."
"It turns out freedom ain't nothing but missing you, Wishing I'd realize what I had when you were mine."
"I'd go back in time and change it but I can't. So if the chain is on your door I understand."
"Maybe this is wishful thinking, Probably mindless dreaming but if we loved again, I swear I'd love you right."
"And how you held me in your arms that September night. The first time you ever saw me cry."
"And I don't know why but with you I'd dance in a storm in my best dress...Fearless."
"And I don't know how it gets better than this. You take my hand and drag me head first...Fearless"
"And you know I wanna ask you to dance right there. In the middle of the parking lot...Yeah"
"Well count to ten, take it in. This is life before you know who you're gonna be."
"Cause when you're fifteen and somebody tells you they love you. You're gonna believe them."
"Romeo save me, they're trying to tell me how to feel. This love is difficult, but it's real."
"You'll be the prince and I'll be the princess, It's a love story, baby, just say yes."
"That you were Romeo, you were throwing pebbles and my daddy said \"stay away from Juliet\"."
"We were both young, when I first saw you. I close my eyes and the flashback starts- I'm standing there, on a balcony in summer air."
"Romeo take me somewhere, we can be alone. I'll be waiting; all there's left to do is run."
"He's just another picture to burn!"
